title: Partnership Proposal Generator
description: Create partnership proposals that get yes. Structure win-win deals that benefit both businesses and actually get signed.
prompt:
Help me create a compelling partnership proposal that gets accepted. Structure a win-win deal that makes sense for both businesses.

MY BUSINESS:
- Company Name: [YOUR COMPANY]
- What We Do: [YOUR BUSINESS]
- Our Strengths: [WHAT YOU'RE GOOD AT]
- Our Audience: [SIZE AND DEMOGRAPHICS]
- Our Needs: [WHAT YOU WANT FROM THEM]

POTENTIAL PARTNER:
- Company Name: [THEIR COMPANY]
- Their Business: [WHAT THEY DO]
- Their Audience: [THEIR CUSTOMER BASE]
- Their Strengths: [WHAT THEY'RE GOOD AT]
- Contact Person: [NAME AND TITLE]

PARTNERSHIP CONCEPT:
- Type: [Referral/Affiliate/Joint venture/Cross-promotion/Integration/Other]
- Basic Idea: [WHAT YOU WANT TO DO TOGETHER]
- Duration: [One-time/Ongoing/Trial period]
- Investment Required: [Money/Time/Resources needed]

VALUE EXCHANGE:
- What We Bring: [YOUR CONTRIBUTION]
- What They Bring: [THEIR CONTRIBUTION]
- Revenue Split (if any): [PROPOSED SPLIT]
- Success Metrics: [HOW TO MEASURE SUCCESS]

CONTEXT:
- Previous Relationship: [None/Customer/Vendor/Competitor]
- Their Likely Concerns: [WHAT MIGHT WORRY THEM]
- Deadline/Urgency: [TIMELINE]
- Competition: [OTHER OPTIONS THEY HAVE]

Create:
1. Email subject line that gets opened
2. Executive summary (3 sentences max)
3. Partnership proposal outline
4. Value proposition (why them specifically)
5. Proposed terms and structure
6. Success stories or case studies
7. Implementation timeline
8. Risk mitigation strategies
9. Clear next steps
10. Follow-up sequence if no response

Make it benefit-focused for them, not feature-focused about you. Show exact numbers/projections where possible.
